title: Polar Drawing Robot
excerpt: Notes from building a mural robot using stepper motors and GRBL.
content: I built a robot that draws murals using polar coordinates, a TSP path optimizer, and GRBL. Future improvements: servo Z control and better cable management.

title: What Cold Plunges Taught Me About Focus
excerpt: Short reflections from doing cold plunges after runs.
content: Breath, focus, and consistency — the same tools for math, writing, and training.
